entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 2:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
